MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL78 postcode area of Brynteg. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:43PM. Our engineers have arrived  on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:45PM on 2nd November 2020
